articles.title: How Blackhawks plan to move forward without Connor Bedard, 8 others on injured reserve - NBC Sports Chicago
articles.description: The Blackhawks have nine players on injured reserve, including Connor Bedard. It’s comical at this point.

The Chicago Blackhawks recently completed a five-game road swing, and it was a disastrous trip, not only because they went 0-4-1 during it but b… [+3547 chars]
